snippet: "Leap of Faith" would be the latest addition to a Broadway season that had a dearth of new original musicals only a few months ago.
abstract: "Leap of Faith" would be the latest addition to a Broadway season that had a dearth of new original musicals only a few months ago.

headline.main: 'Leap of Faith' Hopes to  Land  on Broadway This Spring
headline.print_headline: ‘Leap of Faith’ Aims For Broadway in Spring
